articles.title: Cristiano Ronaldo breaks another international record while scoring 112th goal - Manchester Evening News
articles.description: Manchester United forward Cristiano Ronaldo has now made 181 international appearances, beating the European nation record held by Spain's Sergio Ramos.
articles.content:
Manchester United forward Cristiano Ronaldo on Saturday made his 181st appearance for Portugal, bettering the European record previously held by Spain's Sergio Ramos.

articles.description: The billionaire businessman had been at the forefront of a populist wave that swept Central Europe
articles.content:
Czech Prime Minister Andrej Babis lost his re-election bid on Saturday, a major upset against a billionaire businessman who had personified the rise of populist nationalism in Central Europe.
